NAME

wmiv - quick image viewer using wrlib

SYNOPSIS

wmiv [image(s)|directory]

OPTIONS

--help

print help text

--version

print version

KEYS

[+]

zoom in

[-]

zoom out

[Esc]

actual size

[D]

launch diaporama mode

[L]

rotate image on the left

[Q]

quit

[R]

rotate image on the right

[▸]

next image

[◂]

previous image

[▴]

first image

[▾]

last image

AUTHOR

wmiv is a part of Window Maker. It was written by David Maciejak.

This man page is part of
WindowMaker 0.95.9
Window Maker Manual: wmiv(1)
